project_descr: Strengthening capacities in the Western Balkans countries to address environmental problems through remediation of high priority hot spots

outputs.output_descr:
Achieve improvement of environmental situation and quality of life for citizens living in and around polluted areas through least cost measures, improved local and national policy dialogue and supply of domestic professional services in the environmental management sector. 
•	Secure progress in clean-up and remediation of Bajza hotspot, 
•	Enhanced regional co-operation through improved information sharing progress and supply of professional consultancy services regarding good environmental management

project_title: western balkans environmental hot spots programme
